<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cloak of the Bat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=425)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to Climb in order to move around while inverted.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-level [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) spell on you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

>
Cloak of the Bat
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cloak of the Bat (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 13,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3, and you can activate the cloak any number of times per day.
